name: Send a welcome private message to your new BlueSky followers

assignments.name: text
assignments.value:
Hey! Rivals2StatBot Dev/Bot here. I go by Panodonata in game (sorry if we've run into each other and I got salty XD. I'm working on it!)

This message is fully automated, kinda part of my goal with the project! I really appreciate you following the bot and I hope you enjoy what it produces. I'm adding new features fairly frequently, so check it out from time to time. My current project is to automatically answer incoming questions with accurate tournament results queried directly from start.gg! I may eventually create some bots on other platforms, but we'll see what life has in store for me! 

Thanks again!

parameters.content: ### 2. Define your welcome message and link here

### 3. **Important** 

You need to manually run "Save followers to file" once before the first time so you populate your list of existing followers

## Send a welcome private message to your new BlueSky followers

This flow will save your current followers in a file and check for new ones on the next execution, sending them the Defined message an link as a private message.

Once messages are sent, the new list of followers will be saved into the file.

**Important: Follow the yellow notes in order before enabling the full flow for the first time**

### 1. Define your Bluesky user and app password first

The App password should have access to private messages
